title: Get token- Success
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs into the app
custom_expected:
THEN a POST is made to mlb.com/oauth2 endpoint
AND an access token is provided in the response
AND a refresh token is provided in the response
AND an id token is provided in the response

title: Traffic Splitter
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the app
custom_expected:
THEN a call is made to the traffic splitting service
AND a value of "MLB" OR "LEGACY" is returned
AND the app routes users mlb.tv experience based on what is returned from this call

title: Register Device (logged in)
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the app
custom_expected:
THEN a call is made to media-gateway to register the device (registerDevice)
AND the headers include a Bearer token
AND the response includes deviceId
AND the response includes sessionId
AND the response includes entitlements

title: Register Device (logged out)
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the app
custom_expected:
THEN a call is made to media-gateway to register the device (registerDevice)
AND the response includes deviceId
AND the response includes sessionId
AND the response includes entitlements

title: Register receipt device (Anonymous entitled user)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an anonymous user that has purchased a subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the app
custom_expected:
THEN a call is made to media-gateway with registerReceiptDevice mutation
AND the headers include location coordinates (X-MLB-LAT, X-MLB-LONG, X-MLB-ZIP, X-MLB-COUNTRY)
AND the response includes deviceId
AND the response includes entitlements
AND the response includes location
AND the response includes sessionId

title: content search
custom_steps: WHEN the user starts a game
custom_expected:
THEN a GET request should be made to media-gateway content search query
AND the headers include location coordinates (X-MLB-LAT, X-MLB-LONG, X-MLB-ZIP, X-MLB-COUNTRY)
AND the response should include all of the queries included in the query string
Here is the list of all possible fields. Check the request entered for your client:

assetTrackingKey: String
audioTracks: [AudioTrack]
callSign: String
contentId: String
contentRestrictionDetails: [ContentRestrictionDetail]
contentRestrictions: [String]
contentType: ContentType
description: String
feedType: MediaFeedType
fields: [SearchFieldValue]
gamePk: Int
language: String
mediaId: String
mediaState: MediaConfiguration
milestones: [Milestone]
playbacks: [PlaybackInfo]
sportId: Int

title: Playback Session Init
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts a game
AND a mediaId, deviceId, and sessionId are successfully retrieved
custom_expected:
THEN a POST should be made to the https://media-gateway-npd.mlb.com/graphql/ endppoint 
AND the request headers should include a bearer token
AND the headers include location coordinates (X-MLB-LAT, X-MLB-LONG, X-MLB-ZIP, X-MLB-COUNTRY)
AND the request should include mediaId
AND the request should include deviceId
AND the request should include sessionId
AND the response should include adExperience
AND the response should include content
AND the response should include heartbeatInfo
AND the response should include playbackSessionId
AND the response should include playbackToken
AND the response should include playbackUrls
AND the response should include tracking

title: Session creation failure
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to starts a game
AND calls to the graphql media-gateway endpoint are blocked
custom_expected:
THEN a POST should be attempted to the media-gateway endpoint
AND playback should fail

title: Heartbeat
custom_steps: WHEN the user has successfully initiated playback of a game
custom_expected:
THEN a heartbeat call should be made in increments defined by the session creation
AND the request url should include the playbackSessionId
AND the request url should include the userId (oktaId) (EXAMPLE: https://playback-heartbeat-qa.mlb.com/?userId=00u2r8zesehnpld08357:MLB&playbackSessionId=0ed35daa-5b9f-4feb-8384-3dc38fafd8c0)
AND the response contents should include a success message

title: Refresh Session
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user watching an MLB.tv feed
custom_expected:
THEN a call is made to media-gateway refresh session mutation
AND the response includes deviceId
AND the response includes sessionId
AND the response includes entitlements
AND the response includes location

title: Concurrency Cap- positive case  5 streams succeed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts streams games on 5 separate devices
(NOTE: A pause between the start of sessions may be required for sessions to register for concurrency purposes
custom_expected: THEN the user can successfully stream the games on all 5 devices

title: Concurrency Cap- negative case  6 or more streams fail
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts streams games on 6 separate devices
(NOTE: A pause between the start of sessions may be required for sessions to register for concurrency purposes
custom_expected:
THEN the user can successfully stream the games on the first 6 devices
AND the user cannot successfully stream on the 6th device
AND the user cannot successfully stream on any other additional devices

title: Heartbeat stops when playback stops
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with an active session
AND heartbeat calls are being observed at regular intervals
custom_expected: THEN the heartbeat calls should also stop
